name: Elona'sThoughts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: secret santa
des: This skill is a secret santa gift to one of my best friends. You may ask Alexa "what is Elona thinking right now?" and Alexa will share one of 50 affirmations to my friends. The purpose of this skill is to lift up my friend and share a series of affirmations.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
